full:
1 Lone Repo updates

  • LOCUS - poi-refresh


20 PR/issues updates
✔️ Done: 9
⚠️ WIP: 3
👀 Needs review: 8

COMMON

lumen-labs - (sallkall, YizhiCatherineZhang, hyx131, kc-leung)

OTHERS

  • 👀 Issue #29 Components Library: New Select Component (c: sallkall, a: kc-leung)
  • 👀 Issue #28 Design Tokens: Color Palette and Color Usage (YizhiCatherineZhang)

ADDED

  • ⚠️ PR #30 list - update list component with react-window integration (hyx131)

CHANGED

  • ✔️ PR #27 text-field new input design changes & add textarea variant (kc-leung)
    • Issue #25 Components Library: new Input component
  • 👀 PR #24 switch, range-label & date-range components new color palette classname (kc-leung)

python-curriculum - (woozyking)

CHANGED

  • ⚠️ PR #32 Other/animated fsas (woozyking)

ADDED

  • ⚠️ PR #31 15 - task queue (ft. NLP stuff again) (woozyking)


TRAINING-GYM

cognitive-backend - (wenting-pan)

ADDED

  • 👀 PR #1 Adding enrichment etl function and setup for repo (wenting-pan)

cognitivesdk - (wenting-pan)

CHANGED

  • 👀 PR #2 Adding setup.py (wenting-pan)

FIXED

  • ✔️ PR #1 Enrichment ETL - Bug fix on db connection close statement (wenting-pan)


MOBILE

mobilesdk - (sb689)

CHANGED

  • 👀 PR #2 : Feature/event logging (sb689)


LOCUS

data-hub - (wwwmonsterlam, vikivanov)

ADDED

  • ✔️ PR #47 update - add column "deprecated" to table "connections" (wwwmonsterlam)
  • 👀 PR #46 ecr-image-update - github action creates missing images and repos (vikivanov)

CHANGED

  • ✔️ PR #45 GitHub Action - ECR image update (vikivanov)

locussdk - (maluhoss, wenting-pan, waynezhu6, woozyking)

ADDED

  • ✔️ PR #118 Geo - add type checks for params (maluhoss)
  • ✔️ PR #115 Locussdk - add slack handler to remaining exposed methods (maluhoss)

CHANGED

  • 👀 PR #117 Adding cognitivesdk repo package (wenting-pan)
  • ✔️ PR #116 Notebook Tests - add test dev dependencies (waynezhu6)
  • ✔️ PR #108 geo - GeoCohort functions (woozyking)

EnrichData - (maluhoss)

FIXED

  • ✔️ PR #50 Convert Geoid - fix intersection error (maluhoss)



JOURNALS

Catherine
Did:

  • Feedback form - Add questions in the Tyepfrom
  • Design system/colour - use guide


Doing:

  • Connection hub - work flow chart
  • Design system/Toast - Notification snackbar
  • Design system/Tab - new tab component
  • Query Lab - saved and execution tab
  • POI management - POI page tab
  • logo - update logo's color after changing the design system



KC
Did:

  • Lumen-labs/textarea - add textarea for input


Doing:

  • Lumen-table - replace replaceable MUI components with lumen-labs components
  • Lumen-labs/select - add select component



Leo
Did:

  • cohort analysis - revise FSA-level time-lapse (under python-curriculum/other-topics)
  • builder - compose GeoCohort clientToken as report-<report_id>-<start>-<end> from existing AOI report
  • builder - add geo_cohort step support to provision audience and report IDs
  • cohort analysis - prepare time-lapse choropleth (in notebook) with plotly choropleth (using animation_frame/group)
  • firstorder/mobilesdk - move stub upload endpoint to its own base route
  • locussdk/geo - get_geocohort() and gen_geocohort_token()
  • builder - check existing AOI report jobs against same { wl, cu, job_name } row(s) in public.geo_cohort table and determine whether to show a link to ATOM or the create GeoCohort button
  • locussdk/geo - create_geocohort test against new POST /builder/geocohort endpoint
  • snoke/builder - from existing AOI report jobs create GeoCohort (POST /builder/geocohort)
  • python-curriculum/15 - run the celery queue as workflow pipeline inside a flask app, with slash command to obtain headlines
  • python-curriculum/15 - pick apart the NLP portion as section 2, organize the main content for generic content parsing of websites (maybe count number of <a> tags, or pure text)
  • python-curriculum/15 - task queue illustration


Doing:

  • locussdk/log - reroute logging through API (to not expose the Slack token)
  • cognitive-backend - create portunus project/stage
  • python-curriculum/15 - incorporate opinion/fact scoring into the pipeline, and formatting of headlines
  • python-curriculum/15 - finalize written material, prepare session script
  • locussdk - groom through and work on open-sourcing, with pypi distribution
  • builder - adapt popular times segments type with necessary changes
  • nn-viz - input visualizations
  • nn-viz - classification/regression visualizations
  • updates/nlp - incorporate with fasttext.js and dedupe actual runs



Shari
Did:

  • snoke/conn-hub - deprecated connections UI
  • snoke/conn-hub - hard delete UI + sql
  • snoke/conn-hub - soft delete + restore
  • merged refactoring commits
  • snoke/conn-hub - refactoring - extracted getting sample config + POST connection out


Doing:

  • snoke/conn-hub - multiple connections per set - better usage flow
  • snoke/conn-hub - connectors view details modify connection values



Selin
Did:

  • ql/query - setup columns accordion list-items
  • ql/query - view colour chip component
  • ql/query - assign view colour + view initial to columns/filters
  • ql/query - implement query panel top nav (use react router?)
  • ql/query - setup columns accordion & list header
  • ql/views - add hasSelected visual indication for views list + change loading to skeleton + add default no-views display
  • ql/views - add page-not-found illustration & states
  • ql/views - add wl/cu selector wrapper
  • [ql-todo]: Tooltip component overflow (all-views-modal views list top item)
  • ql - integrate chromatic for storybook publish
  • ql/discussion - meet with Sally for changes on views accordion
  • ql/views - colours update for interactions & texts
  • ql/views - replace filter with search ability
  • ql/views - truncate views accordion headers + show full name in tooltip
  • lumen-labs - 0.1.0-alpha.4 release with new textfield + lists
  • ql/todo - open overall todo's database for detailed yet low priority todos
  • ql/re-layout - loading page refactor
  • ql/refactor - further fix accordion transition
  • ql/refactor - fix list overflow + replace current list with react-window list
  • ql/accordion - refactor Accordion component (max-height transition)
  • ql/components - refactor List component with react-window
  • ql/List - add Grid columns feature to react-window based List component


Doing:

  • ql/query - list items re-ordering with dnd
  • updates - preserve links + remove design journal database



Kyle
Did:

  • widget-studio/backend - switch from plotly to chart-systems
  • widget-studio - set up Notion Project
  • Finish widget-studio standalone storybook
  • widget-studio/backend - Widget inherit config object if wrapped with WidgetStudio, function normally
  • widget-studio/backend - consolidate and refactor widget-studio logic to accomodate architecture changes
  • widget-studio/backend - modify widget-studio architecture to WidgetStudio ↔ Widget


Doing:

  • Continue transitioning Locus to use URL params
  • widget-studio/backend - design config object to be passed from WidgetStudio to Widget child (minimize action inside WidgetStudio as much as possible)
  • widget-studio/backend - set up widget ID table
  • widget-studio/backend - Widget fetch config object if not wrapped with WidgetStudio, function normally
  • keywarden/user-management - sanitizing email value before creating a user
  • keywarden/user-management - missing customer selection when selecting role as "White label ops/reporting", and only appears after reselecting the white label
  • keywarden/user-management - various "invalid user access" warning when the user object is "corrupt"
  • keywarden/user-management - standalone component




KrisC
Did:

  • data_acquisition - satellite_imagery - three potential areas: building labeling, vehicle identification and land usage
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - Read up on other state of the art satellite image labeling solutions - SpaceNet Challenges - 7 of them with open repos, look really useful


Doing:

  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - build test model - want to be able to extract polygons the nn draws around the houses and buildings
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - be able to match the building polygons to user records (maybe use Solaris for the pipeline?)
  • satellite_imagery - vehicle identification - read up on state of the art - Preligens looks useful
  • satellite_imagery - vehicle identification - build test model
  • satellite_imagery - land usage - read up on state of the art semantic segmentation
  • satellite_imagery - land usage - build test model
  • satellite_imagery - building labeling - see how we can use the building footprint data to match with user records





Erika
Did:

  • firstorder - test creating POIs in DB with the new createPOIByCoordinate function
  • poi-manage - add to Message information on creating POI points #57
  • poi-manage - add clear button to clear form from geocoder info #57
  • react-maps - create PR #87
  • react-maps - make pre-release v0.6.5-alpha.1
  • firstorder - use reverse geocoder to retrieve address/postalcode for POIs based on coordinates
  • firstorder - include exceptions from reverse geocoding for for cities, postal codes, regions, countries
  • firstorder - work on the query that retrieves the postal code with the largest overlap over a given polygon
  • poi-manage - adjust code to complete the creation of POIs with drawing and set drawnPOI param to flag all drawn POIs #57
  • react-maps - create notion project page
  • projects - put out a general message to devs to create projects in notion so we can better organize tasks for interns to start on
  • poi-manage - create project page in notion
  • poi-manage - outline old & new create POI processes and present them to the team


Doing:

  • react-maps/locus-map - implement onClick and onHover events #82
  • ql-ui/widget-studio - review Controller elements for final map widget that agree with Locus Map roadmap



Sally
Did:

  • design/lumen-labs - design toast/snackbar components
  • design/lumen-labs - design overflow behaviour for input and select
  • design/lumen-labs - tentative scrollbar component
  • design/locus-ql - design a batch delete option in dataset left panel/cart
  • design - copyedit and update product UX survey
  • design - test new progress bar, tooltip, code block components in usage, graduate to Figma components library
  • design/locus-ql - new multi-select (with checkbox) dropdown
  • design/locus-ql - refractor view selection modal empty selection design
  • design/locus-ql - add indication of previously select dataset group in the selection modal
  • design/locus-ql - add remove dataset option on the builder homepage
  • design - create a Zeplin guide
  • design - start a design team project-roadmap page
  • design/lumen-labs - redesign selector/dropdown components (finished design in figma, zeplin & guide release on Monday)


Doing:

  • design/locus-ql - update ql user flow diagram to include new builder and query results features
  • design/connection-hub - user flow diagram for creating new connections
  • design/connection-hub - user flow diagram for modifying and managing existing connections
  • design/locus-ql - add snackbar/toast popup after dataset save-selection
  • design/locus-ql - replace old input and select components with new ones
  • design/locus-ql - anchor buttons (back to top, jump to bottom) for navigating a long list



Maggie
Did:

  • public transit/commute: regroup with Steven and Chris to discuss progress and plan for next steps
  • public transit/commute: set up database with new transit data
  • QL chart system: set up storybook and be able to run chart-system repo locally
  • QL chart system: regroup with Do to make plans for next steps


Doing:

  • QL chart system: change line chart code to vanilla JS code
  • QL chart system: implement d3 for line chart
  • QL chart system: set up a meeting with Do to go over React
  • public transit/commute: set up a meeting with Chris to go over his script for TTC scheduling
  • public transit/commute: come up with own implementation for GO scheduling
